title: Archbishop Hartmayer addresses return to Mass in letter to the faithful ( 2020-05-22)
body: ATLANTA—Archbishop Gregory J. Hartmayer, OFM Conv., shares the following letter to Catholics in the Archdiocese regarding expiration of the dispensation of obligation to attend Mass:
